text:
Problem:
Test data lost in the Listener(Result tree and Aggregate Graph) when I change the language to English during the test running.

Reproduce:
1. The default langue is Chinese simplified
2. Running any test script.
3. Go to Options -> Choose Language
4. Change language to English
5. And then the test result and data is gone and the listener is empty.

Expect:
At least give a warning message or dialog to let user know the testing data will lost after change the language during the test.
creator: vivian.smxwuyun@gmail.com
p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 56927 ***
